column4: how to extract the *.mpg data out of an *.bin file? is there any gui-application for (k)ubuntu? <--- found myself a solution maybe .. http://surfnet.dl.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/vcdgrab/vcdgrab-0.1.tar.gz ... If someone were searching for something like this.
I need to extract the file. Viewing the file is no problem.
mplayer has loads of options, I'm sure it's got the ones for dumping a stream as well
